content:
Re: Versions and configurations

Larry Masinter (masinter@parc.xerox.com)
Wed, 29 May 1996 16:16:48 PDT

  • Messages sorted by: [ date ][ thread ][ subject ][ author ]
  • Next message: Larry Masinter: "Re: Version identifier in URL"
  • Previous message: Daniel W. Connolly: "Re: Version identifier in URL"
  • Maybe in reply to: Keith Dawson: "Versions and configurations"
  • Next in thread: Christopher Seiwald: "Re: Versions and configurations" 
One of the recent insights is that the result of content-negotiation
MAY but isn't required to use URLs for the variations. So a server
might choose to have a separate URL for each of the French and English
renderings of the same page.
